SELECT SEQ_ALIO_URL AS SEQ, URL_NM,IN_URL_YN, URL, RECODE_ST, TO_CHAR(CHECK_DT, 'yyyy/mm/dd HH:MI:SS') CHECK_DT, RESULT_CODE, SORT_NO, PARENT_ID, CHECK_YN FROM T_ALIO_URL WHERE PARENT_ID=#PID#
AND RECODE_ST = #sel_recode#
ORDER BY SORT_NO
